遺傳資源的獲取與共用: access and benefit sharing{=ABS}of genetic resources

偶見種: accidental species; incidental species; casual species

活性污泥法: activated sludge method; activated sludge process

最小風險原理: conjugate principle of risk and opportunity

瀕危野生動植物種國際貿易公約: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora{=CITES}

保護野生動物遷移物種公約；波昂公約: Convention on the Conservation of Migratory Species of Wild Animals{=CMS}{Bonn Convention}

國際重要水鳥棲地保護公約{溼地公約}；拉姆薩爾濕地公約: Convention on Wetlands of International Importance Especially as Waterfowl Habitat; Ramsar Convention on Wetlands}

蒸發散熱臨界溫度: critical temperature for evaporative heat loss

生物遺傳資源的衍生所有權: derived property right of biogenetic resources

能量[金字]塔: energy pyramid; pyramid of energy flow

氟年代測定法[化石]: fossil bone dating by fluorine analysis

自由大氣二氧化碳濃度增加實驗: free-air carbon dioxide enrichment experiment{=FACE experiment}

政府間氣候變化專門委員會: Intergovemmental Panel on Climate Change; IPCC

生物多樣性及生態系服務政府間科學及政策平臺: Intergovernmental Science-Policy Platform on Biodiversity and Ecosystem Service{=IPBES}

國際鳥類保護協會: International Council for Bird Preservation; ICBP

國際科學聯合會理事會；國際科學聯合會總會: International Council of Scientific Unions; ICSU

全球變遷人文面向科學計畫: International Human Dimension Programme on Global Environmental Change{=IHDP}

國際自然暨自然資源保育聯盟；世界保育聯盟: International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources{=IUCN}; World Conservation Union

國際生物科學聯合會: International Union of Biological Sciences; IUBS

土地利用與地表覆蓋變遷[計畫]: Land Use and Land Cover Change{=LUCC}

堰塞湖: landslide dam; debris dam; barrier lake

人與生物圈計畫: Man and the Biosphere Programme; MAB Programme

標識再捕法；標識放流法: mark-recapture method; mark-and-recapture method; mark-and-release method

最大持續生產量: maximal sustainable yield{=MSY}; maximnm sustainable yield
maximum sustainable yield; maximum sustained yield{=MSY}

箱網養殖: net cage culture; cage net culture

淨生產比率: NP/GP ratio; net production/gross production ratio

淨初級生產比率: NPP/GPP ratio; net primary production per gross primary production ratio

經濟合作暨發展組織: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development{=OECD}

隨機生態位邊界假說；折棒模型: random niche-boundary hypothesis; broken stick model

環境問題科學委員會；國際環境科學委員會: Scientific Committee on Problems of the Environment; SCOPE

一大或數小原則: single large or several small principle{=SLOSS principle}

生態系與生物多樣性經濟學: The Economics of Ecosystems and Biodiversity{=TEEB}

聯合國海洋法公約: United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea{=UNCLOS}

聯合國教科文組織；聯合國教育、科學與文化組織: United Nations Educational Scientificand Cultural Organization{=UNESCO}

垂直生命表: vertical life table; static life table

世界保育聯盟；國際自然暨自然資源保育聯盟: World Conservation Union; International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources{=IUCN}
